dict.acceptation: 更好的(good和well的比较级)；更熟练的；好的；健康的；
更好者；较优越者；前辈；长者；

sent.orig: She had never sung better; a deed better left undone; better suited to the job.
sent.trans: 她从没唱得更好过；最好不要做的事；更适合这个工作。

sent.orig: These machines are getting better and better, better able to recognise more accents and variations.
sent.trans: 这些机器正变得越来越强，强大到可以识别出更多的口音和变调。

sent.orig: We will, as always, to better products and better technology, better service dedicated to you.
sent.trans: 我们将一如既往的把更好的产品，更好的技术，更好的服务奉献给您。

sent.orig: You better watch out, you better not cry! You better not pout, I'm telling you why.
sent.trans: 你最好注意，你最好别叫！你最好别噘嘴，我告诉你其中原委。

sent.orig: You will see better cars and you will see better service and better quality.
sent.trans: 你将会看到更好的汽车；你将会看到更好的维修服务和更高的质量。
